On 5.3.2012 20:04, ALAN KAPLAN (BLOOMBERG/ 731 LEXIN) wrote: > Hi Lubos, Greetings again.. I was wondering if you could answer this question. So we have some files that we index, that have weird names, like: > foo::bar::test.js (all with :: in them). Is this a bug in OpenGrok or some sort of limitation? > I did see this defect ticket, but I don't know if this applies to this bug.. > http://defect.opensolaris.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=323 > > Also, I am using OpenGrok version 0.9 > > Whenever you get a chance, most appreciated.
